front.title: Stateless Automatic IPv4 over IPv6 Encapsulation / Decapsulation Technology: Specification

abstract.t: This document specifies Stateless Automatic IPv4 over IPv6 Encapsulation / Decapsulation Technology (SA46T) base specification. SA46T makes backbone network to IPv6 only. And also, SA46T can stack many IPv4 networks, i.e. the networks using same IPv4 (private) addresses, without interdependence.
